last_episode_to_air.name: New Mann Sound
last_episode_to_air.overview: Tamela decides to have a listening party after enlisting music legend, Timbaland, to help her create a new sound. Despite firing Tia from Tillymann, Tamela and David need her help to plan the party. Special Guest: Timbaland.

name: It's A Mann's World
overview: Multitalented entertainers David and Tamela Mann are known mostly for their stage and screen collaborations with producer Tyler Perry ("Meet the Browns").

episodes.name: It's a Mann's World
episodes.overview: Tamela performs at a major concert in Kansas against the wishes of David and the rest of the family, who insist that she needs surgery to fix her injured knee.

episodes.name: She's the Mann
episodes.overview: Tamela has a major knee surgery, but her recovery is even harder for the rest of the family who have to take care of their difficult patient, especially when she convinces David Jr. to sneak her to the studio against the doctor's orders?

episodes.name: The Mann Games
episodes.overview: The family faces off in the Mann Family Games, and this year David Jr. is determined to dethrone his dad and become the Mann of the House, but first he must contend with his sister, Tiffany, who has a major problem with him that could to ruin the event.

episodes.name: Mann of the Hour
episodes.overview: Tamela and David Jr. book David his first standup gig as himself, not Mr. Brown, but David doesn't have enough time to prepare and worries that he'll let down his fans, his family and himself.

episodes.name: Last Mann Standing
episodes.overview: The Mann clan face off in an epic prank war, while David Sr. braves the emotional journey of seeking out his estranged biological father.

episodes.name: Tamela's Big Test
episodes.overview: Tamela has her first concert since recovering from knee surgery, Tia sings solo for the first time, and David Sr. tries to help David Jr. get the romance back in his marriage.

episodes.name: Mann Family Talent Show
episodes.overview: The Mann clan hosts a talent show at their church for two families in need, but will it tear them apart or bring them closer together.

episodes.name: Mann of the House
episodes.overview: David and Tamela perform at the Steve Harvey Neighborhood Awards in Atlanta, but Tamela and the kids' toughest challenge is trying to pull off a surprise party for David's 48th birthday.

episodes.name: Mann of the Kitchen
episodes.overview: The Mann-clan competes in an annual Top Chef-style family cook-off with David and Tamela as opposing captains and potential celebrity judges.

episodes.name: Best Mann
episodes.overview: David Sr. is beyond excited about David Jr. and Chantal's big vow renewal bash.

episodes.name: Mann Style
episodes.overview: Tamela offers to let David Jr. produce a song for her upcoming new album.

episodes.name: Mann Up
episodes.overview: David accepts an invitation to host a Hip-Hop rodeo.

episodes.name: Mann vs WoMann
episodes.overview: David doesn't tell Tamela he is doing a dangerous horse trick at the hip hop rodeo; David Jr. and Chantel agree to not have more kids, but disagree on who will have the surgery.

episodes.name: Mannliest Mann
episodes.overview: David and David Jr. compete to prove who's 'The Manliest Mann', but David's Mannhood is tested when his daughters spook him with a Haunted House.

episodes.name: Mann and the City
episodes.overview: Tamela tries to turn David into a city slicker when she is honored with an award in NYC; David puts Tiffany's new boyfriend through the ringer.

episodes.name: Handy Mann
episodes.overview: For the first time Sonya, Porcia and Tia open up to David and Tamela about their troubled past; David recruits David Jr. to build the grandkids a playhouse at the MANNsion.

episodes.name: Action Mann
episodes.overview: The family takes a touching journey to visit patients at St. Jude's Children's Hospital; David has all eight grandchildren spend the night to prove to his kids that he and Tamela can still handle parenting.

episodes.name: New Mann Sound
episodes.overview: Tamela decides to have a listening party after enlisting music legend, Timbaland, to help her create a new sound. Despite firing Tia from Tillymann, Tamela and David need her help to plan the party. Special Guest: Timbaland.
